trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `transformers` section of the `webParts` section of a configuration file.

<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects, as part of a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection>, specify custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class.
These transformer classes act as bridges between connected Web Parts, translating data sent by a connection provider into something that the connection consumer can accept.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection> class always contains an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> type.
Use this instance, rather than creating your own.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to the collection.
The collection must not already contain a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object with the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to add already exists in the collection.
\- or -
The collection is read-only.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects from the collection.

This method removes all <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects from the collection and inserts a `clear` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref> object at the specified index location.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection.Item%28System.Int32%29> property overwrites the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object if it already exists; otherwise, a new object is created and added to the collection.
The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object at the specified index, or `null` if there is no object at that index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object with the passed <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name"></xref> property value from the collection.

This method removes a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object from the collection and, if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object is defined in a higher-level configuration file, inserts a `remove` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
The name of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object from the collection at the passed index.

This method removes a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object from the collection and, if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object is defined in a higher-level configuration file, inserts a `remove` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
